atk-abh03a18:2_2: Tattha yesaṁ anuruddhasaṁyutte “imesañca panāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṁ pajānāmī”tiādīni dasasuttāni ayoniso gahetvā “tathāgatabalaṁ sāvakasādhāraṇa”nti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a18:2_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, laddhiyaṁ ṭhatvā paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a18:2_4: Tathāgatabalañca nāmetaṁ sāvakehi sādhāraṇampi atthi asādhāraṇampi sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇampi.
atk-abh03a18:2_8: Ṭhānāṭṭhānādīni hi sāvakā padesena jānanti, tathāgatā nippadesena.
atk-abh03a18:2_9: Iti tāni uddesato sādhāraṇāni, na niddesato.
atk-abh03a18:2_10: Ayaṁ pana avisesena sabbampi sādhāraṇanti āha.
atk-abh03a18:2_11: Tamenaṁ tato vivecetuṁ tathāgatabalaṁ sāvakabalanti puna anuyogo āraddho.
atk-abh03a18:2_12: Tattha paṭhamapañhe niddesato sabbākāravisayataṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:2_15: Pubbayogo ca pubbacariyā ca atthato ekaṁ, tathā dhammakkhānañca dhammadesanā ca.
atk-abh03a18:3_0: Indriyaparopariyattipañhe ekadesena sādhāraṇataṁ sandhāya sāvakavisaye paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:4_1: Idāni yasmā uddesato ṭhānāṭṭhānādīni sāvako jānāti, tasmā sāvakassa tathā jānanaṁ pakāsetvā tena jānanamattasāmaññena tesaṁ sāvakasādhāraṇattaṁ patiṭṭhāpetuṁ sāvako ṭhānāṭṭhānaṁjānātītiādayo paravādipañhā honti.
atk-abh03a18:4_2: Tattha indriyaparopariyattiñāṇaṁ channaṁ asādhāraṇañāṇānaṁ aññataranti na gahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:4_3: Āsavakkhayena vā āsavakkhayanti yaṁ tathāgatassa āsavakkhayena saddhiṁ sāvakassa āsavakkhayaṁ paṭicca vattabbaṁ siyā nānākaraṇaṁ, taṁ natthi.
atk-abh03a18:4_4: Vimuttiyā vā vimuttinti padepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a18:5_1: Idāni yaṁ sakavādinā “āsavānaṁ khaye ñāṇaṁ sādhāraṇa”nti anuññātaṁ, tena saddhiṁ saṁsanditvā sesānampi sādhāraṇabhāvaṁ pucchituṁ puna āsavānaṁ khayetiādayo paravādipañhāva honti.
atk-abh03a18:5_2: Tesaṁ vissajjane sakavādinā āsavakkhaye visesābhāvena taṁ ñāṇaṁ sādhāraṇanti anuññātaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:5_4: Puna ṭhānāṭṭhānādīnaṁ āsavakkhayeneva saddhiṁ saṁsanditvā asādhāraṇapucchā paravādisseva.
atk-abh03a18:5_5: Tattha āsavakkhayañāṇe paṭikkhepo, sesesu ca paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a18:5_6: Tato indriyaparopariyattena saddhiṁ saṁsanditvā asādhāraṇapucchā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a18:5_8: Tathāpi indriyaparopariyatte paṭiññā, sesesu ca paṭikkhepo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a18:5_9: Tato ṭhānāṭṭhānādīhi saddhiṁ saṁsanditvā indriyaparopariyattassa sādhāraṇapucchā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a18:8_2: Tattha yesaṁ “na kevalaṁ āsavakkhayañāṇameva ariyaṁ, atha kho purimānipi nava balāni ariyāni”cceva laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a18:8_3: te sandhāya ariyanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a18:8_4: Puna yadi taṁ ariyaṁ, maggādīsu tena aññatarena bhavitabbanti maggādivasena pucchā sakavādissa, paṭikkhepo itarassa.
atk-abh03a18:9_3: Sattasuññatā nāma diṭṭhiyā parikappitena sattena suññā pañcakkhandhā.
atk-abh03a18:9_4: Saṅkhārasuññatā nāma sabbasaṅkhārehi suññaṁ vivittaṁ nissaṭaṁ nibbānaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:9_5: Tattha paravādī nibbānārammaṇataṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, saṅkhārārammaṇataṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:9_6: Manasi karotīti puṭṭhopi nibbānameva sandhāya paṭikkhipati, saṅkhāre sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:9_7: Tato sakavādinā “ṭhānāṭṭhānādimanasikāro saṅkhārārammaṇo, suññatamanasikāro nibbānārammaṇo”ti imaṁ nayaṁ gahetvā “dvinnaṁ phassānaṁ dvinnaṁ cittānaṁ samodhānaṁ hotī”ti puṭṭho lesokāsaṁ alabhanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:9_11: Ekadhammasmimpi āropetvā ṭhapetabbasaṅkhātena ca paṇidahitabbaṭṭhena paṇihitasaṅkhaṁ gatena sattapaṇidhinā appaṇihitā khandhā.
atk-abh03a18:9_12: Taṇhāpaṇidhinā taṇhāya vā ārammaṇabhūtena sabbasaṅkhārapaṇidhinā appaṇihitaṁ nibbānaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:9_13: Tasmā idhāpi paṭikkhepo ca paṭiññā ca purimanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-abh03a18:10_1: Tato “yathā satipaṭṭhānādayo lokuttaradhammā ariyā ceva suññatādiārammaṇā ca, kiṁ te evaṁ ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇa”nti anulomapaṭilomapucchā honti.
atk-abh03a18:10_2: Tattha sabbāpi paṭiññā sabbe ca paṭikkhepā paravādisseva.
atk-abh03a18:10_4: Pāḷiyaṁ pana sesāni saṅkhipitvā avasāne cutūpapātañāṇameva vibhattaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:10_5: Tato paraṁ sakasamayepi “ariya”nti siddhena āsavānaṁ khayañāṇena saddhiṁ saṁsanditvā sesañāṇānaṁ anulomato ca paṭilomato ca ariyabhāvapucchā honti.
atk-abh03a18:10_6: Tā sabbā paravādissa, paṭiññā paṭikkhepo ca sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a18:10_8: Pāḷiyaṁ panettha paṭhamanavamāneva dassetvā satta ñāṇāni saṅkhittānīti.
atk-abh03a18:13_3: Yathā pana malīnaṁ vatthaṁ dhoviyamānaṁ malā vimuccati, evaṁ sarāgaṁ cittaṁ rāgato vimuccatī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a18:13_4: te sandhāya sarāganti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a18:13_5: Tato rāgasahagatantiādinā nayena puṭṭho maggakkhaṇe cittaṁ vimuccati nāma.
atk-abh03a18:13_6: Tadā ca evarūpaṁ cittaṁ natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:14_0: Saphassantiādinā nayena puṭṭhopi yathā phasso ca cittañca ubho rāgato vimuccanti, evaṁ rāgassa vimuttiṁ apassamāno paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:17_2: Tattha yesaṁ “jhānena vikkhambhanavimuttiyā vimuttaṁ, maggakkhaṇe samucchedavimuttiyā vimuccamānaṁ nāma hotī”ti laddhi, te sandhāya vimuttaṁ vimuccamānanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarasa.
atk-abh03a18:18_2: Yathā vimuttaṁ, ekadesena vā ekadese vā avimuttaṁ hoti kiṁ evaṁ ekadesaṁ vimuttaṁ, ekadesaṁ avimuttanti pucchati.
atk-abh03a18:18_5: Yathā hi kariyamānā kaṭādayo vippakatattā ekadesena katā ekadesena akatā honti, tathā idampi ekadesaṁ vimuttaṁ ekadesaṁ avimuttanti āpajjati.
atk-abh03a18:18_6: Tato paravādī kaṭādīnaṁ viya cittassa ekadesābhāvā paṭhamapañhe paṭikkhipitvā dutiye vimuccamānassa apariniṭṭhitavimuttitāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:18_8: Na hi taṁ tadā samucchedavimuttiyā vimuccamānaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:18_10: Tañhi tadā samucchedavimuttiyā vimuttekadesena vimuccamānantissa laddhi.
atk-abh03a18:18_11: Tato sakavādī “yadi te ekameva cittaṁ ekadesaṁ vimuttaṁ ekadesaṁ avimuttaṁ, evaṁ sante yo ekeneva cittena sotāpanno hoti, sopi te ekadesaṁ sotāpanno, ekadesaṁ na sotāpanno āpajjatī”ti codanatthaṁ ekadesaṁ sotāpannotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a18:19_0: Uppādakkhaṇapañhe yadi ekameva cittaṁ vimuttañca vimuccamānañca, ekasmiṁ khaṇe vimuttaṁ ekasmiṁ vimuccamānaṁ āpajjati.
atk-abh03a18:20_4: Tasmā yaṁ tassa yogino evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato etehi āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccati, taṁ vimuccamānaṁ nāma hotīti.
atk-abh03a18:20_7: yadi te vimuccatīti vacanato vimuttaṁ vimuccamānaṁ, idha vimuccatīti vacanābhāvato vimuttameva siyā, na vimuccamānanti.
atk-abh03a18:21_0: Idāni “yathā te vippakatavimuttitāya vimuccamānaṁ, kiṁ evaṁ vippakatarāgāditāya rajjamānādīnipi atthī”ti codanatthaṁ puna atthi cittantiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:21_1: Paravādināpi tathārūpaṁ cittaṁ apassantena sabbaṁ paṭikkhittaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:21_2: Atha naṁ sakavādī “dveyeva koṭiyo, tatiyā natthī”ti anubodhento nanu rattañceva arattañcātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a18:21_4: nanu bhadramukha, rāgasampayuttaṁ cittaṁ rattaṁ vippayuttaṁ arattanti dveva koṭiyo, rajjamānaṁ nāma tatiyā koṭi natthīti?
atk-abh03a18:21_7: Vimuttipakkhepi dveyeva koṭiyo dassetuṁ hañci rattañcevātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a18:21_9: yadi etā dve koṭiyo sampaṭicchasi, avimuttañceva vimuttañcā ti imāpi sampaṭiccha.
atk-abh03a18:21_11: Vimuccamānaṁ nāmāti paramatthato tatiyā koṭi natthīti.
atk-abh03a18:24_2: Tattha yesaṁ anulomagotrabhumaggakkhaṇe kilesānaṁ samudācārābhāvato aṭṭhamakassa sotāpattimaggaṭṭhapuggalassa dve pariyuṭṭhānā pahīnāti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānañceva sammitiyānañca;
atk-abh03a18:24_3: tesaṁ aññataraṁ sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, maggakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya diṭṭhiyā anuppattiṁ sandhāya paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a18:24_4: Tato yasmā diṭṭhi nāmesā sotāpannasseva pahīnā, na maggaṭṭhassa, tasmā aṭṭhamako puggalo sotāpannoti anuyogo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a18:24_6: Anusayapañhe pariyuṭṭhānato añño anusayoti tesaṁ laddhi, tasmā “na heva”nti paṭikkhittaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:25_0: Sīlabbataparāmāsapañhepi sīlabbataparāmāsapariyuṭṭhānanti vohāraṁ na passati, tasmā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:26_0: 369.Maggo bhāvitoti pañhe tasmiṁ khaṇe bhāveti, na bhāvito.
atk-abh03a18:26_3: Yadi hi amaggena pahīyetha, gotrabhupuggalādīnampi pahīyethāti āpajjanato.
atk-abh03a18:29_2: Tattha yesaṁ “aṭṭhamako maggakkhaṇe indriyāni paṭilabhati nāma, no cassa paṭiladdhāni hontī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a18:29_3: te sandhāya natthi saddhindriyanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a18:29_4: Natthi saddhāti puṭṭho pana saddhindriyato saddhāya nānattaṁ sallakkhetvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:29_6: Yathā pana yassa atthi mano, tassa manindriyampi atthi;
atk-abh03a18:29_7: evaṁ yassa saddhādayo atthi, tassa atthi saddhindriyādīnipīti dīpanatthaṁ atthi mano atthi manindriyantiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:32_2: Tattha yesaṁ catutthajjhānadhammūpatthaddhaṁ maṁsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhu nāma hotīti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānañceva sammitiyānañca;
atk-abh03a18:32_3: te sandhāya maṁsacakkhunti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a18:33_0: Puna “maṁsacakkhu dibbacakkhu, dibbacakkhu maṁsacakkhū”ti puṭṭho taṁ mattameva taṁ na hotīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:34_3: Dibbacakkhussa ca atisukhumampi rūpaṁ gocaro, na tādisaṁ itarassāti evametesaṁ ānubhāvagocarā asadisā.
atk-abh03a18:35_0: Upādiṇṇaṁ hutvā anupādiṇṇaṁ hotīti puṭṭho yasmā maṁsacakkhu upādiṇṇaṁ, dibbacakkhu anupādiṇṇaṁ, na ca maṁsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhūti icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:35_1: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho yasmā “maṁsacakkhussa uppādo, maggo dibbassa cakkhuno”ti vacanaṁ nissāya maṁsacakkhupaccayā dibbacakkhu uppajjati, tañca rūpāvacarikānaṁ catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ pasādoti icchati, tasmā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:35_2: Kāmāvacaraṁ hutvāti puṭṭhopi yasmā na maṁsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhūti icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:35_3: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho rūpāvacarajjhānapaccayena uppannattā rūpāvacaraṁ nāma jātanti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:36_0: Rūpāvacaraṁ hutvā arūpāvacaranti puṭṭhopi tato paraṁ bhāvanāya arūpāvacarakkhaṇe rūpāvacaracittassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:36_1: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho arūpāvacarikānaṁ catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ pasādo hutvā uppajjatīti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:36_2: Apariyāpannabhāvaṁ panassa na icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipatiyeva.
atk-abh03a18:37_2: Dveva cakkhūnīti puṭṭho kiñcāpi dibbacakkhuno dhammupatthaddhassa paññācakkhubhāvaṁ na icchati, paññācakkhussa pana atthitāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:37_3: Puna puṭṭho maṁsacakkhu dhammupatthaddhaṁ dibbacakkhu hotīti laddhivasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:40_2: Tattha ekaṁyeva sotanti puṭṭho dvinnaṁ atthitāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:40_3: Puna puṭṭho yasmā tadeva dhammupatthaddhaṁ dibbasotaṁ nāma hoti, tasmā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:43_3: yathākammūpage satte pajānātī”ti suttaṁ ayoniso gahetvā yathākammūpagatañāṇameva dibbacakkhunti laddhi, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a18:43_4: Puna yathākammūpagatañca manasi karotīti puṭṭho ekacittassa ārammaṇadvayābhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:43_6: Puna lesokāsaṁ adatvā dvinnaṁ phassānanti puṭṭho paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:43_7: Iti yathā iminā yathākammūpagatapadena, evameva ime vata bhonto, sattātiādipadehipi saddhiṁ yojanāsu attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a18:44_0: 378.Āyasmāsāriputto yathākammūpagataṁ ñāṇaṁ jānātīti idaṁ sakavādī yasmā thero appicchatāya abhiññāñāṇāni na vaḷañjetīti ekacce na jānanti, tāni panassa neva atthīti maññanti, tasmā taṁ “dibbacakkhuno alābhī thero”ti maññamānaṁ pucchati.
atk-abh03a18:44_1: Teneva kāraṇena “atthāyasmato sāriputtassa dibbacakkhū”ti parato puṭṭho paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:44_2: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho yaṁkiñci sāvakena pattabbaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ therena anuppattanti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:44_3: Idānissa vikkhepaṁ karonto sakavādī nanu āyasmā sāriputtotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a18:44_4: Imañhi gāthaṁ thero vaḷañjanapaṇidhiyā eva abhāvena āha, na abhiññāñāṇassa abhāvena.
atk-abh03a18:44_6: Tasmā tassa laddhiyā therassa yathākammūpagatañāṇameva atthi, no dibbacakkhu.
atk-abh03a18:44_7: Tena vuttaṁ “tena hi na vattabbaṁ yathākammūpagatañāṇaṁ dibbacakkhū”ti.
atk-abh03a18:47_2: Tattha yesaṁ tāvatiṁse deve upādāya tatuttari devesu yasmā te pañca verāni na samācaranti, tasmā saṁvaro atthīti laddhi, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, verasamudācāraṁ apassato paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a18:47_3: Tato yasmā saṁvaro nāma saṁvaritabbe asaṁvare sati hoti, tasmā asaṁvarapucchā sakavādissa, devesu pāṇātipātādīnaṁ abhāvena paṭikkhepo itarassa.
atk-abh03a18:48_0: Atthi manussesūtiādi saṁvare sati asaṁvarassa asaṁvare ca sati saṁvarassa pavattidassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:49_0: 380.Pāṇātipātā veramaṇīti ādipañhesu pāṇātipātādīnaṁ asamācaraṇavasena paṭiññā, pāṇātipātādīnaṁ natthitāya paṭikkhepo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a18:50_0: Avasāne natthi devesu saṁvarotipañhe pāṇātipātādīni katvā puna tato saṁvarābhāvaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a18:50_1: Tato chalavasena yadi saṁvaro natthi, sabbe devā pāṇātipātinotiādipucchā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a18:50_4: Evaṁ patiṭṭhitā pana laddhi appatiṭṭhitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a18:53_2: Tattha yesaṁ “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti vacanato vinā viññāṇena paṭisandhi nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a18:53_3: “Saññuppādā ca pana te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti vacanato asaññasattānampi cutipaṭisandhikkhaṇe saññā atthīti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a18:53_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a18:53_5: Tato naṁ sakavādī “kiṁ te taṁ ṭhānaṁ saññābhavo”tiādīhi codetuṁ saññābhavo saññāgatītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a18:53_6: Taṁ sabbaṁ tato parañca pāḷinayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a18:56_2: Tattha yesaṁ “nevasaññānāsaññāyatana”nti vacanato na vattabbaṁ “tasmiṁ bhave saññā atthī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a18:56_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
